text: Gusti Ayu Karang was a regent in Indonesia from 1809 to 1814. Her home kingdom was the Kingdom of Karangasem. She was the mother of Dewa Agung Istri Kanya, whose father and co-regent was Dewa Agung Putra I.Adrian Vickers, Bali, A Paradise Created. Singapore: Periplus 1989, p. 66. She invented new conditions for Dewa Agung Istri Kanya to become the "Virgin Queen of Klungkung." ==References== Category:Monarchs of Bali Category:Queens regnant Category:1814 deaths Category:19th-century women rulers
title: Gusti Ayu Karang
